description: This table stores Health Information Management (HIM)-specific information about printed letters.

columns.name: CODING_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coding record.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the patient associated with the coding record at the time the coding record was created.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status of the coding record (hidden, soft-deleted, etc.).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: COD_RCD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record type of the coding record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


CDI Review


Doc Review Tracking

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: The creation date of the coding record.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The hospital account which is linked to the coding record.

columns.name: CDI_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current clinical documentation improvement (CDI) status of the account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Started


In Progress


Physician Query


All Reviews Completed

columns.name: CDI_ASGN_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) user currently assigned to this account.

columns.name: CDI_STATUS_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment associated with the current clinical documentation improvement (CDI) status.
